weekly payroll process Reviewed salary changes stemming from merit increases promotions and pay adjustments Accountant 04 2002 to 06 2006 Company Name City State Verified details of transactions statements Reconcile fixed asset system with general ledger Run and make journal entries for depreciation of fixed assets Transition financials and fixed assets due to merger with PRG Staff Accountant
